comments:

the warning icon (white cross on red circle) and the message 

"Update

Reason:
Update"

Repeating the cvs update the box doesn't appear.

I am using the february stable build with Team 2.0 activated to connect to a 
cvs server via pserver.
Is there anything in the log file (.metadata/.log)?
